TextView.android:text:
- Added the first (but simple) remaining time estimation
- Added the license text to the application (see About settings)
- Updated the application icon
- First version which is available on the Google Play store for everyone
- Prepared the code to be able to handle in-app billing stuff (for easy donations)

- Added a preference dialog for clearing the obtained battery statistics\n- Added a status bar indicator for the current charging level of the battery\n- Added a 'What's new' dialog on the first startup of a new version
- Changed the layout of the battery statistics database

- Fixed a bug which caused that the preferences were not accessible\n- Added a first debug option to send the battery statistic database via mail\n- Updated the infrastructure to establish communication between the service and the app
- Added code to obtain statistics about the battery charings\n- Added GPL header to all source files\n- Moved all strings to the resource file (for supporting localization)
- Added a preference dialog for changing the used theme of the app\n- Added an dialog to show information about the application
- Initial version which is available in the Google Play Store
